title: World friendship
creator_credit: Francis Thompson, Julien Bryan and International Film Foundation
brief_description: A World Conference of Girl Guides and Girl Scout representatives from 26 nations as seem through the eyes of three girls from Brazil, Canada and USA. Despite barriers of custom and language, the girls are brought together through their work and play at the Conference.
